H, A = map(int, input().split())  # 分割された文字列を整数に変換してリストに格納する

print(-(-H // A))  # 切り上げ除算
h, a = map(int, input().split())  # h = height, a = angle
print((h-1)//a + 1)  # formula for finding the number of steps


a, b = map(int, input().split())
print((a - 1) // b + 1)

print(-(-H // A))


h, a = map(int, input().split())  # h = height, a = angle
print((h-1)//a + 1)  # formula for finding the number of steps 


h, a = map(int, input().split())
print((h - 1) // a + 1)

h, a = map(int, input().split())
print((h - 1) // a + 1)

H, A = map(int, input().split())  # 横幅、高さ

print(-(-H // A))  # 余り切り上げ


H, A = map(int, input().split())

H, A = map(int, input().split())

print(-(-H // A))  # 切り上げ除算


H, A = map(int, input().split())  # height, arrows
print((H-1)//A + 1)  # number of arrows

n, x = map(int, input().split())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))
d = 0
for i in range(n):
    if i == 0:
        d += l[i]
    else:
        d += l[i] + x
print(d)
